Name: GliBird
Notes: The colorful tropical bird that the player can glide with. It's usually deactivated, but it becomes functional when the gliding sequence is started after talking to a correctly set up Jibberjay (Pichan) or Jibberjay Racer (PichanRacer).

Obj_arg6.Name: Indicator Volume Draw Count
Obj_arg6.Description: Specifies how many rendering passes should be performed for the red indicator volume. If set to 0, the indicator volume won't be used. Default is 3.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated when the player starts gliding with Fluzzard.

NamePos.Description: Additional placements that can be freely placed.

Camera.Description: Used when the player and Fluzzard die.
